page.title: 11Marchwood Military Port
page.content: {Marchwood Military Port }is partly in our area.It is a special port just for the use of the Army.Civilian shipping only uses it when on military business.It was first established in 1943.Several sorts of ships are based there.They include large troop landing ships, and these are named after King Arthur's knights.They are large ocean going ships and they can carry as many as 18 tanks.They were used in the Falkland's war when Sir Galahad was sunk with some loss of life.There are also smaller landing craft,and hovercraft,which would be used in landing soldiers in times of conflict.There are training facilities and maintainance areas where ships and vehicles are repaired.There is a good relationship between the Army and the villagers and many of the soldiers live on an estate in Marchwood.
